description:
Kazuma takes the recruitment exam to get accepted into Pantasia, the best bakery in Japan, and he meets the ambitious yet snarky Kyoutaro Kawachi, who is willing to sabotage Kazuma’s dough to win.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Maharajah !! Le jour où le mont Fuji est tombé !
Maharajah!! The Day Mt. Fuji Fell!
วันที่ภูเขาไฟฟูจิหล่น!
マハラジャッ!! 富士山が降ってきた日!
